Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Buku ili lavumbulutsidwa kwa iwe, mtima wako usavutike ndi kuti uchenjeze ndi ilo ndipo ndi chikumbutso kwa anthu okhulupirira
Tsatirani zonse zimene zadza kwa inu kuchokera kwa Ambuye wanu ndipo musatsatire wina powonjezerapa Iye. Ndizochepazimenemumakumbukira
Ndipo mizinda ndi yambiri imene Ife tidaononga! Chilango chathu chidadza pa iwo usiku kapena pamene iwo adali kugona nthawi ya masana
Iwo sadalire mwa mtundu wina uli wonse pamene chilango chathu chinadza kupatula kuti: “Ndithudi ife tidali anthu olakwa.”
Ndithudi Ife tidzawafunsa onse amene uthenga wathu udatumizidwa ndipo, ndithudi, Ife tidzafunsa Atumwi
Ndipo, ndithudi, tidzawauza modziwa ndipo, ndithudi, sikuti Ife padalibe
Pa tsiku limenelo muyeso udzakhala wachilungamo. Motero iwo amene muyeso wawo udzakhala wolemera amenewo adzakhala opambana
Koma iwo amene muyeso wawo udzakhala wopepuka amenewo ndi olephera chifukwa ankakana chivumbulutso chathu
Ndipo Ife tidakupatsani ulamuliro padziko ndipo tidakuikirani zofunikira mu moyo wanu koma kuthokoza kwanu ndi kochepa
